title: 04/19/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/19/21 DPS Best Of
description:
The boys are back from their week long break and there's a lot to discuss. First, Dan adopted a puppy over the weekend, Winnie. In hour two, ESPN Monday Night Football Analyst Louis Riddick joined the show to talk about what the Falcons will do with the fourth pick and how Trevor Lawrence’s comments could impact his draft standing. Michael Rosenberg, who wrote the piece on Trevor in Sports Illustrated joined the show to discuss the article that sparked the controversy and some other takeaways from sitting down with the probable first overall pick in the 2021 NFL Draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

The boys are back from their week long break and there's a lot to discuss. First, Dan adopted a puppy over the weekend, Winnie. In hour two, ESPN Monday Night Football Analyst Louis Riddick joined the show to talk about what the Falcons will do with the fourth pick and how Trevor Lawrence’s comments could impact his draft standing. Michael Rosenberg, who wrote the piece on Trevor in Sports Illustrated joined the show to discuss the article that sparked the controversy and some other takeaways from sitting down with the probable first overall pick in the 2021 NFL Draft.
